Issue.creator: swatiraj
Issue.description: Right now in Fabric samples project , there is a first-network application which gives the network setup , but it has fixed no of peers,Â I thought there should be a sample application which will help the developers to concentrate on working with hyperledger fabric framework without worrying about setting up the whole network. It will ask you about the number of organisations , no of peers in each organisations ,domain name and channel name and setup the whole network accordingly.
